name: Terminus (C64) Commodore 64
description:
Collect disks and stuff, infect & upload data into terminals, face your destiny.

- collect spores and floppy disks
- infect and upload data into terminals
- some terminals will be activated depending on hidden factors as well as other, such as the rare sighting of the amoeba or extra traps.
- make it to the end and meet your destiny

* Bonus: take pleasure in controlling and watching the wiggly dancing somersaulting protagonist.

Game was participant (along with Chode Loader and Wild Wafers Deluxe) in Richard Bayliss' annual SEUCK compo/expo,  http://www.tnd64.unikat.sk/   AND features 2 great Bayliss tracks.

ENJOI
